rows.label: qst700902_msg0101
rows.name:
I see a trail... That means our
quarry is no ghost...

rows.label: qst700902_msg0201
rows.name:
Tracks, I see.
I wonder where they will lead us...

rows.label: qst700902_msg0301
rows.name:
These tracks don't appear human...
We should stay vigilant.

rows.label: qst700902_msg0401
rows.name:
Oh, here's a trail!
It's heading this way, see?

rows.label: qst700902_msg0501
rows.name:
I knew there's no such thing as ghosts!
I'm gonna follow these.

rows.label: qst700902_msg0601
rows.name:
Monster tracks.
I'm not in the mood for games, but...
Ready or not, here we come.

rows.label: qst700902_msg0701
rows.name:
As expected. If we follow these tracks,
we can find our mystery quarry.

rows.label: qst700902_msg0801
rows.name:
These are marks of a violent trampling.
We should track them to their source.
